Player History
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 5/5/1969 to a 1-year deal worth $640,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/16/1972 to a 1-year deal worth $999,999 per year...
Drafted in 2nd round, 40th overall pick, by Texas in 1973...
Traded from Texas to Minnesota on 2/20/1973 (Going to TEX: SS L. Bales. Going to MIN: P L. Bradford)...
Earned first career win on 5/19/1976...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1977...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1978...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/8/1981 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 5-6 weeks...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1982...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
